thread.title: Podcast: Calkins, Schad, Stukenborg talk Tigers' upset of Ole Miss and more
thread.title_full: Podcast: Calkins, Schad, Stukenborg talk Tigers' upset of Ole Miss and more

author: Geoff Calkins
title: Podcast: Calkins, Schad, Stukenborg talk Tigers' upset of Ole Miss and more
text:
How else to begin the latest episode of our Tiger Football Podcast then with columnist Geoff Calkins, beat writer Tom Schad and deputy sports editor Phil Stukenborg eating some crow, each having picked Ole Miss to beat Memphis last Saturday.
"It was fun to be wrong," says Calkins, the host, between bites.
Click below to hear the podcast, which looks back to the unbeaten Tigers' 37-24 victory over the Rebels -- and ahead to Friday night's game at Tulsa, and beyond.
